name: Cheese Maze
description:
Cheese Maze is an addictive puzzle game. You guide a little mouse through a maze. The Maze is full of challenging obstacles and puzzles. Solve the puzzles to find a way out. But beware of the Cat which is hunting you. Collect all the cheese and bring it to your home.

Can you master it?

This game is made with Love 💗 and CHEESE 🧀!Features
  • Mouse 🐭
  • Cats 😼😼😼
  • Dangerous Traps
  • Over 35 Level
  • 🧀🧀🧀 CHEESE 🧀🧀🧀
  • Addictive Puzzles
  • Arcade Styled Gameplay
